about us

We are Whitechurch&Vald, literally. We gave our names to our company - and this is important. We work in a way that we would not be ashamed, we work putting ourself. Because for us it's not just yet another design studio - it's our names.

We are involved in every detail of the workflow - and we intend to do so always, because we want to keep the bar high. And we do everything in person.

Andrey Belotserkovsky

Founder, CEO
andrey@wav.design
+7 916 318 6943
